lead_paragraph: The letter expresses support for the president’s proposed strategy for NASA and criticizes cuts contained in a NASA authorization bill now before the House.
snippet: The letter expresses support for the president’s proposed strategy for NASA and criticizes cuts contained in a NASA authorization bill now before the House.

headline.main: Nobel Winners Sign Letter Backing Obama Space Plan
headline.seo: Nobel Winners Back Obama Space Strategy
headline.print_headline: Nobel Winners Sign Letter Backing Obama Space Plan
